      • hit

        public void hit(Deck deck)
        Draws a card from the deck and adds it to the players hand.
        Parameters:

      • sum

        public int sum()
        Adds up the total value of your cards, also handles aces (1 or 11).
        Returns:
        Sum of the cards in your hand.

      • isBusted

        public boolean isBusted()
        Returns:
        True if the sum is over 21, false if less than or equal to.
